Informations de dépendance

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>fr.univtln.bruno.pom</groupId>
  <artifactId>common-pom</artifactId>
  <version>0.7.20</version>
  <type>pom</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'fr.univtln.bruno.pom:common-pom:pom:0.7.20'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="fr.univtln.bruno.pom" name="common-pom" rev="0.7.20">
  <artifact name="common-pom" type="pom" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='fr.univtln.bruno.pom', module='common-pom', version='0.7.20')
)

Gradle/Grails

compile 'fr.univtln.bruno.pom:common-pom:0.7.20'

Scala SBT

libraryDependencies += "fr.univtln.bruno.pom" % "common-pom" % "0.7.20"

Leiningen

[fr.univtln.bruno.pom/common-pom "0.7.20"]
